businessProfile.name: Mastro's Steakhouse
businessProfile.address: 8852 E Pinnacle Peak Rd, Scottsdale, AZ 85255, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 8852 E Pinnacle Peak Rd, Scottsdale, AZ 85255, USA

reviews.text: Mastro‚Äôs is easily a top 5 steakhouse in Arizona. The food is top-notch no matter what you order, and the service is consistently amazing. The manager, Bernice, is phenomenal, and the private rooms are perfect for events or special gatherings. The staff has a keen eye for detail, which makes the entire dining experience feel elevated. This place is a solid 5 stars in my book. My only complaint is that parking can be a bit difficult, but once you‚Äôre inside, it‚Äôs well worth it.

Amazing food. Outstanding 5-Star service. Petit filet was tender and juicy. Cesar salad was perfectly dressed. Creamed corn and garlic mashed potatoes were cooked to perfection. Broccoli was also cooked well. Plates are super heated so food doesn‚Äôt get cold! Servers all worked together to ensure a perfect dining experience. Complementary valet should be utilized as parking can get tight in the shared parking lot. I took the time to review the restaurant; I wish they‚Äôd respond with something more than the ‚Äúautomated reply‚Äù of:  ‚ÄúThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. It means so much when our customers share their experience, and we are glad we were able to meet your expectations! We hope to see you again ...‚Äù. Blah!!

The three of us dined at the OG Mastro‚Äôs in North Scottsdale‚Äîand just learned this was the original location. We‚Äôve been driving to Paradise Valley thinking that was the main one, but no more. This is the real deal.

Monica took amazing care of us‚Äîprofessional, warm, and attentive. Hank kept our glasses full with still and sparkling water, always perfectly timed. Just top-tier service all around.

We ordered the Tomahawk Chop Australian Wagyu and the 8 oz A5 New York Strip‚Äîboth phenomenal cuts, perfectly cooked, rich, and tender. For sides, we went big: garlic mashed potatoes, white cheddar mac and cheese, broccolini, and creamed spinach. The portions were massive‚Äîdefinitely sharing size, and absolutely delicious.

The B√©arnaise sauce deserves a moment of its own‚Äîrich, velvety, and the perfect complement to the steaks. Don‚Äôt skip it.

A huge thank you as well to the team member who boxed up our food‚ÄîI didn‚Äôt catch your name, but you packed everything with care. Breakfast tomorrow is going to be legit.

Mike, the GM, came by to check in after our meal‚Äîgreat conversation and a genuine touch that capped off the night perfectly.

The vibe here is different from the newer Mastro‚Äôs locations‚Äîmore grounded, more generous. Great value, outstanding service, and an experience that truly stands out.

We made sure to show our appreciation at the end‚Äîgreat service like this deserves to be recognized. We‚Äôll definitely be back next time we‚Äôre in Scottsdale. Thanks again to the whole team.

We had such an incredible experience at Mastro‚Äôs! Our server, Jared, went above and beyond to make sure everything was perfect. The service was outstanding‚Äîattentive, friendly, and professional. My steak was hands down the BEST steak I‚Äôve ever had‚Äîcooked to perfection and full of flavor. From start to finish, everything exceeded our expectations. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

Mastro‚Äôs is a next level restaurant. The food is great across the board and the service is front and center. The manager (Bernice) is phenomenal and is extremely helpful when we use their private rooms for events. The staff at Mastro‚Äôs is all about the details and they don‚Äôt miss a beat. This place checks off all the boxes.

editorial_summary.overview: High-end chophouse serving steaks, sushi, craft beers & cocktails in chic, contemporary surrounds.

recentReviews.text: Mastro‚Äôs is my all time favorite steak house! The food and service are top tier every time
Loved the Kansas City cut. Delicious. Great atmosphere. Excellent service.

Food is great. Unfortunately an employee by the name of Paul J. Wells openly celebrated the death of a Charlie Kirk and I refuse to spend my money there and have made sure everyone I know doesn‚Äôt go there. At least until they handle his actions.
Really love the French onion soup.  Had a steak and it was very good but lacking something flavor wise. Great drinks and good atmosphere.  Not sure why sometimes bread is $5 and sometimes it's free?

We had such an incredible experience at Mastro‚Äôs! Our server, Jared, went above and beyond to make sure everything was perfect. The service was outstanding‚Äîattentive, friendly, and professional. My steak was hands down the BEST steak I‚Äôve ever had‚Äîcooked to perfection and full of flavor. From start to finish, everything exceeded our expectations. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

When it comes to a steak house, Mastro's is about as high-end as you can get. Beautiful place, amazing bread, food (steaks and seafood), sides and the best dessert on earth, the butter cake. I jokingly always said that they should have a butter cake drive through because I would visit it multiple times a week. We always return to this gem of a restaurant and I highly recommend it.
Service was smooth and consistent throughout.

Mastro‚Äôs is easily a top 5 steakhouse in Arizona. The food is top-notch no matter what you order, and the service is consistently amazing. The manager, Bernice, is phenomenal, and the private rooms are perfect for events or special gatherings. The staff has a keen eye for detail, which makes the entire dining experience feel elevated. This place is a solid 5 stars in my book. My only complaint is that parking can be a bit difficult, but once you‚Äôre inside, it‚Äôs well worth it.

Service was great staff was excellent , food was trash  , way over priced . A homemade turkey sandwich would be better than the steak I received.  $31 for a serving of 4 shrimp , steak taste like it was soaking in oil but dry at the same time no flavor and Hot popping grease flying on your arms your clothes when served . Carpet smelled foul where seated . It's a NO

detailedReviews.text: Mastro‚Äôs is my all time favorite steak house! The food and service are top tier every time

detailedReviews.author: Ed Campbell
detailedReviews.text: Loved the Kansas City cut. Delicious. Great atmosphere. Excellent service.

detailedReviews.text: Food is great. Unfortunately an employee by the name of Paul J. Wells openly celebrated the death of a Charlie Kirk and I refuse to spend my money there and have made sure everyone I know doesn‚Äôt go there. At least until they handle his actions.

The service was outstanding‚Äîattentive, friendly, and professional. My steak was hands down the BEST steak I‚Äôve ever had‚Äîcooked to perfection and full of flavor. From start to finish, everything exceeded our expectations. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

detailedReviews.text: When it comes to a steak house, Mastro's is about as high-end as you can get. Beautiful place, amazing bread, food (steaks and seafood), sides and the best dessert on earth, the butter cake. I jokingly always said that they should have a butter cake drive through because I would visit it multiple times a week. We always return to this gem of a restaurant and I highly recommend it.

detailedReviews.author: Robert
detailedReviews.text: Service was smooth and consistent throughout.

detailedReviews.author: Robb Varelas
detailedReviews.text: Mastro‚Äôs is easily a top 5 steakhouse in Arizona. The food is top-notch no matter what you order, and the service is consistently amazing. The manager, Bernice, is phenomenal, and the private rooms are perfect for events or special gatherings. The staff has a keen eye for detail, which makes the entire dining experience feel elevated. This place is a solid 5 stars in my book. My only complaint is that parking can be a bit difficult, but once you‚Äôre inside, it‚Äôs well worth it.

detailedReviews.author: Shane Jordan
detailedReviews.text: Service was great staff was excellent , food was trash  , way over priced . A homemade turkey sandwich would be better than the steak I received.  $31 for a serving of 4 shrimp , steak taste like it was soaking in oil but dry at the same time no flavor and Hot popping grease flying on your arms your clothes when served . Carpet smelled foul where seated . It's a NO

detailedReviews.author: Adalyn Vehring
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôve never written a food review but omg if you want the best steak you‚Äôve ever had‚Ä¶ go to Mastro‚Äôs üôå

detailedReviews.author: Beverly
detailedReviews.text: The service is excellent

detailedReviews.author: Jonathan Olejnik
detailedReviews.text: Always excellent and we come back yearly

detailedReviews.author: Kevin Close
detailedReviews.text: Everything was top notch as usual.  Its not a cheap restaurant but its worth it.

detailedReviews.author: Ricardo Galarsa
detailedReviews.text: Food was cooked perfectly, right portions and service was amazing

detailedReviews.author: Peter Brown
detailedReviews.text: Masteo's is a fine dining steakhouse. Plenty of staff to cater to you needs. Food portions are large and can be shared between guests. Food was excellent, and timing for each part of the meal was perfect. The wine selection is extensive, I settle on a dry cabernet. We had reservations so no waiting. Most of the close parking is valet service. We found an open spot close by. We had a nice evening dining out. We spent $350.00 on dinner including a generous tip for the service. We dressed casual but appropriately for the evening. Jacket and tie not required. We went to the restaurant in Scottsdale. The drive/directions/traffic was normal for a 6pm dinner reservation. Plan ahead, drive safe, make reservation to ensure you are seated as the tables filled up as the evening hours approached. Lastly, good place to take that special person in your life and enjoy the moment. Everything  else, FORGET ABOUT IT.

detailedReviews.author: Geovanny Tovar
detailedReviews.text: The place had a great layout , definitely would love to go back when im in town to try some more of there foods , the drinks were amazing ....

detailedReviews.author: Carrie Hebert
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food. Outstanding 5-Star service. Petit filet was tender and juicy. Cesar salad was perfectly dressed. Creamed corn and garlic mashed potatoes were cooked to perfection. Broccoli was also cooked well. Plates are super heated so food doesn‚Äôt get cold! Servers all worked together to ensure a perfect dining experience. Complementary valet should be utilized as parking can get tight in the shared parking lot. I took the time to review the restaurant; I wish they‚Äôd respond with something more than the ‚Äúautomated reply‚Äù of:  ‚ÄúThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. It means so much when our customers share their experience, and we are glad we were able to meet your expectations! We hope to see you again ...‚Äù. Blah!!

detailedReviews.author: P
detailedReviews.text:
The three of us dined at the OG Mastro‚Äôs in North Scottsdale‚Äîand just learned this was the original location. We‚Äôve been driving to Paradise Valley thinking that was the main one, but no more. This is the real deal.

Monica took amazing care of us‚Äîprofessional, warm, and attentive. Hank kept our glasses full with still and sparkling water, always perfectly timed. Just top-tier service all around.

We ordered the Tomahawk Chop Australian Wagyu and the 8 oz A5 New York Strip‚Äîboth phenomenal cuts, perfectly cooked, rich, and tender. For sides, we went big: garlic mashed potatoes, white cheddar mac and cheese, broccolini, and creamed spinach. The portions were massive‚Äîdefinitely sharing size, and absolutely delicious.

The B√©arnaise sauce deserves a moment of its own‚Äîrich, velvety, and the perfect complement to the steaks. Don‚Äôt skip it.

A huge thank you as well to the team member who boxed up our food‚ÄîI didn‚Äôt catch your name, but you packed everything with care. Breakfast tomorrow is going to be legit.

Mike, the GM, came by to check in after our meal‚Äîgreat conversation and a genuine touch that capped off the night perfectly.

The vibe here is different from the newer Mastro‚Äôs locations‚Äîmore grounded, more generous. Great value, outstanding service, and an experience that truly stands out.

We made sure to show our appreciation at the end‚Äîgreat service like this deserves to be recognized. We‚Äôll definitely be back next time we‚Äôre in Scottsdale. Thanks again to the whole team.

detailedReviews.author: McKenzie Gomes
detailedReviews.text:
We had an incredible experience at Mastro‚Äôs. The service was truly top notch, probably the best we‚Äôve ever had, and we‚Äôve been to a lot of high-end steakhouses.

Tommy was our server and absolutely phenomenal!! When something didn‚Äôt quite hit the mark, the entire team stepped in with such care and professionalism. They went above and beyond to make sure everything was perfect.

Everyone we met, including Jessie and Phil, made us feel so cared for. We left genuinely impressed and will absolutely be requesting Tommy again. We‚Äôre excited to come back and can‚Äôt recommend this Mastro‚Äôs location enough.

detailedReviews.author: Will Barks
detailedReviews.text:
The 6oz fliet steak was gamey tasting, and the chicken was very dry. The salmon was way overcooked. It's not worth the price tag.
All of the staff we interacted with were excellent. They were friendly, professional, and enjoyable.

detailedReviews.author: Steve Chudyk
detailedReviews.text: We've been dining at Mastro's Steakhouse since they first opened in 1999. The service and food quality have always been consistently amazing. Over the last few years since Michael Scubez the GM has been in charge, it's even stepped up a notch. We had dinner last week with some colleagues, and everyone raved about the sublime culinary experience. Mastros always delivers and consistently exceeds expectations.

detailedReviews.author: Kristen Browne
detailedReviews.text: Mastro's never disappoints! The service is always top-notch, and attentive without being overbearing. Their food is consistently excellent, from perfectly cooked steaks to decadent sides and desserts. The live music added a fun, classy vibe to the evening, and the bar atmosphere was lively yet upscale. It‚Äôs one of those places where everything just feels elevated. Always a great choice for a special night out!

detailedReviews.author: Alan Schiff
detailedReviews.text: One of the best Mastro's!  Great time with friends, wonderful service and an impressive crab cocktail!

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Donti
detailedReviews.text: Mastro‚Äôs is a next level restaurant. The food is great across the board and the service is front and center. The manager (Bernice) is phenomenal and is extremely helpful when we use their private rooms for events. The staff at Mastro‚Äôs is all about the details and they don‚Äôt miss a beat. This place checks off all the boxes.

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Rezler
detailedReviews.text: Best steak i have ever eaten,  apps were great too!

detailedReviews.author: Brit C
detailedReviews.text: Everything about Mastro‚Äôs was 5 star. The food, drinks, service, atmosphere, and their amazing singer Tori!

detailedReviews.author: Ed Meehan
detailedReviews.text: This place was incredible.  Top notch service, top notch food.  Went for a retirement party, and it was easily the best steak I've had in arizona.  Great job

detailedReviews.author: katie f
detailedReviews.text:
I came in on 5/16 to celebrate my anniversary with my partner. We decided to sit at the bar and unfortunately that's when everything turned south. The bartender popped a bottle of champagne in our direction and the cork shot at my glass, small shards went everywhere, my dress and phone were covered in champagne, and my partners pants were soaked and sticky. The managers solution? A round of drinks.
As someone who frequents Mastro's and has even reserved private rooms for family events this was such an embarrassing and unsatisfactory experience. Both my partner and I were so disappointed with the resolution from the manager. Someone could have gotten seriously injured had one of the glass shards cut someone.

detailedReviews.author: Ducoop
detailedReviews.text: Butter cake.  Thats all I have to say.

detailedReviews.author: Milton G
detailedReviews.text: Terrific Staff , Food & Beverage Outstanding, Great Ambiance!

detailedReviews.author: shane snyder
detailedReviews.text: An Arizona - And Our Family Favorite!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Karen Meer
detailedReviews.text: Always an incredible dining experience! Every course is delightful and the butter cake is to DIE for!!

detailedReviews.author: Diane Garrison
detailedReviews.text: The food was excellent. Service was great, answered all our questions.

detailedReviews.author: Tymoteusz Siwy
detailedReviews.text: Excellent steakhouse with just the right ambiance and without too much noise.

detailedReviews.author: Amir Dario Marmolejo Sauza
detailedReviews.text: Jorge is the best waiter! Mastro's Manager you gotta make Shure Jorge stay in Mastro's for a long time! People like him will help grow your business! So glad to meet him! It was a pleasant moment at Mastro's! Food was excellent!

detailedReviews.author: Jackie D
detailedReviews.text: Love this place. We have been three times and it has become our ‚Äúgo to‚Äù hangout. Delicious food and unbelievably good service. The kind of service that you absolutely do not see or receive anymore. There are only two reasons to leave a review, either 5 stars for excellence or 1 star for failure, I only wish there was a 10 star system, that is exactly where Mastro‚Äôs would sit every time. You absolutely must try the prawn appetizer, yum! And can we talk about the lobsters tails? I had stopped ordering lobster at restaurants because they consistently were not cooked well at all. That ended last night when I had the best lobster tail ever! And if you are lucky enough to dine here, make room for dessert! My personal favorites, the cheesecake and the butter cake. So delicious and HUGE serving sizes. I promise that ‚Äúto go‚Äù boxes will be in your future.

detailedReviews.author: Vicki Willson
detailedReviews.text: Tender steak, flavorful salmon, fresh delicious wedge salad, must order the bread basket($5). Also save room for their signature warm butter cake with vanilla ice cream. Wow!

detailedReviews.author: Mary Fletcher
detailedReviews.text: This is my go too when I want a quality meal. It feels like coming home.

detailedReviews.author: Shelly Savorillo
detailedReviews.text: Best meal I have ever had!

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Holland
detailedReviews.text: World class service! Thank you Corey for your patience. You are a true professional who has mastered the craft. The teams service is unmatched. The food was amazing! Jeff, we appreciated the hospitality. KISS THE CHEF.

detailedReviews.author: Karyn Huschke
detailedReviews.text: Great people!!!

detailedReviews.author: Gino
detailedReviews.text: My wife and I had a few service hiccups, nothing major. But, the manager Phil recovered our evening quickly and  gracefully with ease. He is a consummate hospitality professional!

detailedReviews.author: Justin Cooper
detailedReviews.text: Came for Valentine‚Äôs Day. Some of the best steaks I‚Äôve had. We had the filet and bone in ribeye. Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Advanced Surgical Gyn
detailedReviews.text: Excellent service. First rate experience.

detailedReviews.author: Ian McCoy
detailedReviews.text: For a steakhouse, they have more seafood options than steak options; the appetizer menu was 97% seafood. Environment was moderately busy and people were not loud, which is nice. Server was attentitive, along with his honest feedback on dishes and suggestions. Steak was pretty good and the desserts were immaculate. I gotta order the filet next time instead of the bone-in; more meat to enjoy

detailedReviews.author: Missy Abbott
detailedReviews.text: Wow, best restaurant we've ever been to! Everything is perfect!

detailedReviews.author: Mark Friskel
detailedReviews.text: As always, the dinner was great.  Service was very good, and the table assistants (water boy, bread  and bussers) were great.  The only real issues I have are that when I go to an upscale restaurant like this, I am not bothered to spend $400 for dinner for two, but I expect a bit better experience and ambiance.  The tables are so crowded in together that it feels almost like you are sitting with the people at the  next tables.  Also, when I reserve a table for two, I expect to be sitting across from my date, and not side-by-side or even  around the corner of the table.  Make the experience match the price please.

detailedReviews.author: Shari Yates Farrell
detailedReviews.text: Nice, quiet atmosphere, great for family dinners.

detailedReviews.author: Casey Benedict
detailedReviews.text: The original Mastros location. Everything you'd expect from a nice steakhouse.

detailedReviews.author: Corey Pennington
detailedReviews.text: Mastro's was exceptional from the beginning to the end.  The staff is amongst the most professional and friendly I've experienced.  The menus are perfection!  Absolutely delightful evening!

detailedReviews.author: Janet Gottshall
detailedReviews.text: Service was outstanding with great descriptions by the waitress. The dessert butter cake cannot be compared. It was truly a surprise and delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Jared Zumwalt
detailedReviews.text: Was here for a work event, but that didn't stop the staff from going above and beyond. Extra horseradish, please!

detailedReviews.author: Joel Weiler
detailedReviews.text: Great food and service.

detailedReviews.author: Gary Yun
detailedReviews.text: Unparalleled service, food and atmosphere.  The place is unbelievable!

detailedReviews.author: Diana Summers
detailedReviews.text: The best steak I've eaten since Flying Horse Steakhouse in CS, CO!

detailedReviews.author: D Asia Calbert
detailedReviews.text: This is by far the worst ‚Äúfine dining‚Äù experience I‚Äôve ever had. I‚Äôve had better service at McDonald‚Äôs.  üòÇ but seriously rude Maitre D, rude hostess, poor table service and even the valet abandoned his post early and brought our keys to our table before we even finished dinner! I mean have you ever heard of that? The food quality was terrible! Do not attend this location of Mastro‚Äôs! The entire staff should be fired and start over again. That‚Äôs the only solution. We‚Äôve been to all the mastros over the valley. This location was terrible.

detailedReviews.author: John Barenz
detailedReviews.text:
Definitely the best upscale dining in Scottsdale!
Never disappointed, one of our favorites!

detailedReviews.author: D Fowler
detailedReviews.text: Over priced and inconsistent .

detailedReviews.author: n drew
detailedReviews.text: Really wonderful ambiance, service & food!

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Casparis
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food, we loved every bite. The service was exceptional along with the live musician they had. Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: paul axberg
detailedReviews.text: Great date night.  Expensive though.

detailedReviews.author: Micah Popa
detailedReviews.text: As always....and awesome experience @@

detailedReviews.author: John Ustick
detailedReviews.text: One of the best places I've ever eaten. Service is spectacular and the food is beyond compare. Truly and elevated dining experience

detailedReviews.author: Diana Jacobson
detailedReviews.text: I was surprised to see how busy they were on Christmas Eve! Fun atmosphere and the food was amazing per usual. So fun that they had printed special menu wishing me happy birthday at the top ü•∞

detailedReviews.author: Claus Z
detailedReviews.text: Nice ambient and good steak. An observation would be that the ceiling air return ducts should be cleaned

detailedReviews.author: L B
detailedReviews.text: Paulie(petite short girl) who is a host has to be one of the rudest person I have ever came across in this industry. She is not polite for a place who offers ‚Äúfine dining‚Äù. I came in Christmas Day with 2 friends. As soon as we came in we were not greeted with smiles but blank stares. As we are being seated she DEMANDS me, does not ASK me, to take off my hat. Why tell me as you are sitting me? why not advise me at the lobby before walking into the dining room? Instead Paulie wanted to do it in front of everyone then give me attitude with it. Anyways I asked her why, instead of simply replying to me ‚Äúit‚Äôs against dress code‚Äù she quickly escalates the situation by saying to me rudely ‚Äúdo you want me to get a manager‚Äù I answered yes. After being seated it took about 20 min just to get menus. Shortly after Mike the manager comes in says ‚Äúyou can not wear hats in MY dining room‚Äù. My hat is already off and has been off and I didn‚Äôt realize this establishment is called ‚Äúmikes steakhouse‚Äù but okay. He then talks to me like I never been to steakhouse before which I felt he was stereotyping. Anyways for the inconvenience he gifted us free appetizers and a round of drinks which is highly appreciated but come on Mike.  Get off your high horse and talk to your guest like humans. I understand Mike came in to defend his colleague but before you do that at least see both sides don‚Äôt jump to conclusion. Anyways this is why steak 44 will always be #1. Thank you to our server Austin for picking up there slack. He was super cool.

detailedReviews.author: Mark Barbee
detailedReviews.text: Great place for a special occasion.

detailedReviews.author: Philip Roy
detailedReviews.text: Mastro's was very busy on Christmas Eve but they still managed to put out a perfect meal! The 35 day dry aged Kansas City strip was outstanding!

detailedReviews.author: Taylor Carrillo
detailedReviews.text: This place was amazing!! We went earlier on Christmas Eve and we were crazy impressed! Daniel Kim, our server, deserves all the praise!! He took the time to give us a detailed walk through the menu and made sure we were able to make the best decision of our food based on our personal preferences! All thanks to Daniel!!

detailedReviews.author: Cdizzle 42
detailedReviews.text: This is your sign to just go ahead and head here for a celebratory dinner. Top notch service and food but of course the price reflects that. Unbelievable experience and even had live music! Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Wes Harrington
detailedReviews.text: Great food & excellent service as always.

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Phillips
detailedReviews.text: First time there. Took my fiance for her Birthday dinner. They took good care of her. Free cheesecake, menu with her name on it. She enjoyed her food. My steak on the other hand..... I asked for medium and it was deep chewy red. I know ribeyes have marbling but dang. I would have asked to cook it a little more, but I feel they would have looked down on me. It was nice, but I'll stick with Ruth's Chris.

detailedReviews.author: Rica
detailedReviews.text: Thank you very much for the good service, and good food, my family enjoys it. We did not make a mistake in choosing the place to celebrate my husband's birthday, we will visit again. Thank you so much

detailedReviews.author: Any Anon
detailedReviews.text:
You can‚Äôt go wrong with Mastro‚Äôs. Everyone who provides a service is a professional.
As for the food, it‚Äôs not made by chefs. It‚Äôs made by food sorcerers as far as I am concerned.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.7/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the attentive, friendly, and professional service, often highlighting specific staff members who go above and beyond to ensure a perfect dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect

The dining experience at Mastro's is elevated by its great atmosphere and beautiful layout, making it a top choice for special events and gatherings. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

Mastro's is renowned for its perfectly cooked steaks and extensive menu, including standout items like the butter cake, which customers rave about. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews/reputation issues, particularly regarding staff behavior and inconsistent service - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness, as customers expect a better experience for the price - social media marketing can improve this area
Competition/discovery issues, with customers comparing the restaurant unfavorably to competitors - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

positive.author: Rylee Brady
positive.text: Mastro‚Äôs is my all time favorite steak house! The food and service are top tier every time

positive.author: Ed Campbell
positive.text: Loved the Kansas City cut. Delicious. Great atmosphere. Excellent service.

neutral.author: Paul Singh
neutral.text: Food is great. Unfortunately an employee by the name of Paul J. Wells openly celebrated the death of a Charlie Kirk and I refuse to spend my money there and have made sure everyone I know doesn‚Äôt go there. At least until they handle his actions.

neutral.author: Will Barks
neutral.text:
The 6oz fliet steak was gamey tasting, and the chicken was very dry. The salmon was way overcooked. It's not worth the price tag.
All of the staff we interacted with were excellent. They were friendly, professional, and enjoyable.

neutral.author: Mark Friskel
neutral.text: As always, the dinner was great.  Service was very good, and the table assistants (water boy, bread  and bussers) were great.  The only real issues I have are that when I go to an upscale restaurant like this, I am not bothered to spend $400 for dinner for two, but I expect a bit better experience and ambiance.  The tables are so crowded in together that it feels almost like you are sitting with the people at the  next tables.  Also, when I reserve a table for two, I expect to be sitting across from my date, and not side-by-side or even  around the corner of the table.  Make the experience match the price please.

negative.author: Shane Jordan
negative.text: Service was great staff was excellent , food was trash  , way over priced . A homemade turkey sandwich would be better than the steak I received.  $31 for a serving of 4 shrimp , steak taste like it was soaking in oil but dry at the same time no flavor and Hot popping grease flying on your arms your clothes when served . Carpet smelled foul where seated . It's a NO

negative.author: katie f
negative.text:
I came in on 5/16 to celebrate my anniversary with my partner. We decided to sit at the bar and unfortunately that's when everything turned south. The bartender popped a bottle of champagne in our direction and the cork shot at my glass, small shards went everywhere, my dress and phone were covered in champagne, and my partners pants were soaked and sticky. The managers solution? A round of drinks.
As someone who frequents Mastro's and has even reserved private rooms for family events this was such an embarrassing and unsatisfactory experience. Both my partner and I were so disappointed with the resolution from the manager. Someone could have gotten seriously injured had one of the glass shards cut someone.

negative.author: D Asia Calbert
negative.text: This is by far the worst ‚Äúfine dining‚Äù experience I‚Äôve ever had. I‚Äôve had better service at McDonald‚Äôs.  üòÇ but seriously rude Maitre D, rude hostess, poor table service and even the valet abandoned his post early and brought our keys to our table before we even finished dinner! I mean have you ever heard of that? The food quality was terrible! Do not attend this location of Mastro‚Äôs! The entire staff should be fired and start over again. That‚Äôs the only solution. We‚Äôve been to all the mastros over the valley. This location was terrible.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
